import React from "react"; import logoCard from "../images/logo-card.png"; import "../stylesheets/core/_mixins.scss"; import "../stylesheets/core/_variables.scss"; import "../stylesheets/layout/_resetSection.scss"; import Reset from "./Reset"; function PhotoCard(props) { const { name, job, email, phone, photo, github, linkedin, palette, } = props.data; return (

{props.name || "Nombre y Apellido"}

{props.job || "Front-end developer"}

); } export default PhotoCard;
